TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseChannelSinkWithProperties extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.BaseChannelObjectWithProperties
Public MustInherit Class BaseChannelSinkWithProperties Inherits BaseChannelObjectWithProperties

summary.span: 提供基底實作給想要向其屬性公開字典介面的通道接收。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for channel sinks that want to expose a dictionary interface to their properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收提供外掛程式的點，可讓您存取流經的通道，以及可由傳輸機制來傳送訊息至遠端物件的資料流的基礎訊息。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages that are flowing through the channel as well as the stream that is used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者，連結在一起並且所有的通道訊息流經此鏈結之前序列化並傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. 此類別可讓連結要求和繼承要求在類別層級。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別沒有基礎結構的權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CPP/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CS/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/VB/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.vb#2)]

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。

para.span: 當您繼承自，您必須實作屬性和屬性。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must implement the property and the property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者連結在一起，並且所有通道流經這個鏈結的訊息流程之前序列化並傳輸訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. ## Examples [!code-cpp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CPP/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/CS/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapClientFormatterSinkProvider_BaseChannelSinkWithProperties/VB/soapclientformattersinkprovider_customprovider.vb#2)]

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。
